title: Video Editor Meta Ads - Direct Response
job_overview:
About The Role:
We are looking for a Video Editor who has proven experience in creating direct response and engaging FB ads creatives that convert and generate sales.

As a video editor, you will work on your own terms, do what you enjoy and have a direct impact on the success of our brand! 

If this sounds exciting to you then keep on reading. 


About Us: 
We are one of the fastest growing jewellery brands in the UK. In a short space of time, we have sold over 2 million jewellery pieces to 800,000+ customers around the world in just under 5 years.

Our goal is to create an amazing & well known international brand that deeply serves our customers by providing beautiful & high quality jewelry at very affordable pricing. We truly want to make a positive impact on this world through our jewellery but also through various charitable projects we are a part of.

Our team is kind, talented and driven with big goals. We consistently innovate, test new things and we learn and adapt quickly.


What will you be working on?
- Edit Winning Ads Videos: Produce videos for paid advertising campaigns that will drive positive ROI.
- Content Sourcing: Prepare content sourcing briefs/requests to help our content team source footage from lifestyle shoots and content creators that will drive conversions in paid ads
- Research to learn from our competitors (ad spying & up to date trends): Have a deep understanding of what's working in the DTC space on social media to produce winning video ads
- Analyse ads data: hook rates, hold rates, conversions, ROAS and engagement to drive decisions and improve future content.


Requirements:
- A proven track-record of creating winning FB/IG Ads for other brands/clients.
- Creative wizard - you are never short of great ideas.
- Ability to create short-form videos from creative briefs or storyboards
- Ability to enhance edits with color correction and audio sweetening techniques
- Expertise in professional editing software and file delivery: i.e., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, CapCut etc.
- Must be fluent in English.

If this sounds exciting to you, please apply for this role. We would love to hear from you!
